trans-unit.source: Provides design-time visual support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> controls.

The WebZoneDesigner class is the abstract base class for both <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner>, which all the other zone designers inherit from.
trans-unit.target: Klasa WebZoneDesigner jest abstrakcyjna klasa podstawowa dla obu <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner>i <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner>, której dziedziczyć po innych projektantów strefy.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner>

trans-unit.source: By inheriting directly from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> instead of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>, it allows implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method that do not automatically clear the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection, thus enabling the designer to render exceptions from child controls.
trans-unit.target: Poprzez dziedziczenie bezpośrednio z <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>zamiast <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>, umożliwia implementacje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>metodę, która automatycznie nie usuwaj <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>kolekcji, umożliwiając w ten sposób projektanta do renderowania wyjątki od formantów podrzędnych.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Like other designers in this namespace, WebZoneDesigner overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to always return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Podobnie jak innych projektantów w tej przestrzeni nazw, zastępuje WebZoneDesigner <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>Właściwość zawsze zwraca `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the designer bound to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy wystąpienie projektanta powiązany ze skojarzonymi z nimi <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> control associated with the designer.
Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą, czy projektant powinien używać kopia tymczasowa, a nie rzeczywiste kontroli powiązanej z projektanta do generowania znaczników czasu projektowania.
